sentences.sContent: Union leaders and company bosses will meet tomorrow in an attempt to reach a settlement .
sentences.sCn: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

sentences.sContent: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement .
sentences.sCn: 据说他的律师正在商谈一个协议。

sentences.sContent: Hopes grew that a workable peace settlement might emerge.
sentences.sCn: 达成一项可行的和平协定的希望越来越大。

sentences.sContent: She got her home as part of the divorce settlement .
sentences.sCn: 根据离婚协议，她拿到了房子。

sentences.sContent: The company paid out over $10 million in an out-of-court settlement .
sentences.sCn: 这家公司花了1,000多万美元进行庭外和解。

synos.tran: 解决，处理；[会计]结算；沉降；殖民

phrases.pCn: n. 不均匀沉降；[化]沉降差
地基沉降；基础沉降；地基沉陷
最终沉降；[法]最后的授与财产清算；最终结算
固结沉降；地基应力和变形固结沉降
争端解决机构；争端处理机构；争端解决机制

remMethod.val: settle(解决) + ment(名词后缀) → 解决

trans.tranCn: 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民
trans.tranOther: an official agreement or decision that ends an argument, a court case, or a fight, or the action of making an agreement
